code: import Card from'react-bootstrap/Card';import Button from'react-bootstrap/Button';import Container from'react-bootstrap/Container';import Row from'react-bootstrap/Row';import{Link}from'react-router-dom';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const RecipeList=_ref=>{let{recipes}=_ref;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Container,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Row,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{style:{display:'flex',flexWrap:'wrap'},children:recipes.map(recipe=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Card,{style:{width:'18rem',height:'25rem',margin:'10px',backgroundColor:'black',border:'1px solid white'},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"d-flex justify-content-center align-items-center",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Card.Img,{variant:"top",src:recipe.image,alt:recipe.title,style:{width:'17rem',height:'18rem',marginBottom:'10px'}})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Card.Body,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Card.Title,{style:{fontSize:'1.2rem',marginBottom:'10px',color:'white'},children:recipe.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/recipes/".concat(recipe.id),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{style:{padding:'6px 10px',fontSize:'1.0rem',marginBottom:'10px',backgroundColor:'white',color:'black'},variant:"primary",index:recipe.id,children:"Details"})})]})]},recipe.id))})})});};export default RecipeList;
